p: Fifty-Six compounds were detected in Tunisian T. articulata plant, where α-pinene (31.32%), linalool acetate (18.18%), alloaromadendrene (7.55%) and γ-caryophyllene (4.16%) were the major constituents in the oil prepared by hydrodistillation method, the oil exhibited antioxidant activities ( 30, 31).
